GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
drm/msm/mdp5: Fix global state lock backoff

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 0b07f28c23ff50a7fa5dbc3f6b3b6bd53ac9fc70, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit d59be579fa932c46b908f37509f319cbd4ca9a68. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/mdp5: Fix global state lock backoff
